tags: Wait time,
review:
We recently had the pleasure of being treated by Dr. Sonal Katwala during my wife's pregnancy, and I couldn't be more grateful for the care we received. 

Dr. Katwala is incredibly ************* and always took the time to explain every aspect of our treatment in detail. Her expertise and confidence provided us with great comfort throughout our pregnancy journey.

What truly sets Dr. Katwala apart is her compassionate and caring nature. She always made us feel heard and supported, addressing all our concerns with patience and empathy. Her excellent communication skills ensured that we were well-informed and comfortable at every stage of our pregnancy treatment.

The professionalism and high standards of care at her clinic are commendable. The environment is welcoming and organized, contributing to a stress-free experience. 

Thanks to Dr. Katwala's dedicated care, my wife had a smooth and successful pregnancy. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Sonal Katwala to anyone seeking top-notch pregnancy care.\

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: At the very first i visited Dr. Sonal’s clinic for my mother in law’s treatment. Ma’am is very friendly and I found transparency about her treatment. At that time decided whenever I would be pregnant will visit here only and as I decided i do the same. She is very helpful, guide us anytime anywhere. Treat very calmly that patient never be panic in any situation . Her service is not available just only inside the clinic but also whenever u contact her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited doctor clinic at 06th Aug 2022 for pregnancy related care and normal check up.  Below are my comments and feedback.

1. Doctor came 30 mins late - not punctual at all
2. Without even asking my reports, she started giving all negative feedback, that you are aged and there are high changes of complexity , you might face problem , this that in short all negative feedback without even checking the reports
3. I believe should be having positive vibes but she was full of negativity 
4. No response on what’s app messaged - doc asked me to take another blood test and share the report and post which she will confirm to get the Ultra sound done.
5. I messaged her and she dint responded , after so many calls and follow up she got the audacity of reverting me back. Yet again she asked me to get the blood test done again after 2 days.
6. After after one day when I messaged her with the report she dint reverted back.
7. Upon calling her, she is yelling at me and saying what’s the problem, I felt like god damit you only asked me to send the report and after confirmation get the ultra sound done
8. I dint liked the tone and she was actin very pricy, she should know I have charged a bomb for this patient and she need to respond back in a nice way rather than yelling what is it that you want and bla bla.

In short - not recommended at all, *** ** ****** * ***** **** **** **** ***** ***** ******* ****** **** **** ***** *** ******** ** **** ******* Very aggrognt  she is. God saves all those to go to her for check up. Not at all polite and not at all kind .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We had been trying for pregnancy for last 1 and had half year. Had met various gynecologists' on the way but it didn’t help.. had almost lost our hope and confidence.
We came to know about Dr. Sonal Katwala thru one of our close friend who had recently became pregnant under her guidance. So we thought of meeting her.
We had great experience as a first timer.
I especially loved how Dr. Sonal really took her time to explain my conditions with me as well as my treatment options.
Knowledgeable, sensitive, informative… I immediately felt at ease – and felt confident in my receiving expert medical care.
Under her guidance I too became pregnant and was one of my happiest day of my life.
Treatment under Dr. Sonal was great during my whole pregnancy period, but one tragedy struck just 15 days before my delivery date. I became Covid positive.
We as a to be parents for the first time got  scared and all negative thoughts surrounded us.
But Dr. Sonal was calm and positive in that situation. She immediately suggested for C-section delivery and we immediately got hospitalized.
She was physically present during whole surgery with other covid specialists doctors. Surgery was successful and we were happy Parents.
We really appreciate her for all the effort taken by her during Covid period.
Dr. Sonal Katwala is incredible. Not only has she taken great care of my health, but also she is lovely to speak with at every appointment.
I highly recommend becoming her patient!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
2 months after I had had a missed abortion (no heart beat was detected till the 8th week & therefore the pregnancy had to be clinically terminated), when I was scouting for a doctor closer home to save on the travelling I found Dr. Sonal’s profile on Practo with some really positive reviews & booked an appointment with her – This, I now believe was the single most important step I took towards having my baby! Given my earlier failed attempt at having a baby, I was pretty low on confidence & had a very cautious & negative approach towards my prospects at becoming a mother. The detection of a fibroid & chocolate cyst in my pre-pregnancy scans made it only worse. However, Dr. Sonal remained positive & asked us to try naturally for 6 months before we consider other options. As luck would have it we achieved success early & step by step in each appointment, Dr. Sonal managed to increase our confidence with her calm & positive approach. 
The thing I liked most about her is that she has no frills – She gives you the facts as they are, doesn’t panic * **** *** ** ** *********** ****** patiently answers your questions (however silly they may be) & explains her prescriptions – i.e, what purpose each of the medicines she’s prescribing serves – This helps a great deal! Especially since most women begin taking medicines as a routine for the first time in their lives when pregnant & knowing what each medicine is for, helps commit to the routine! – at least it worked wonders for me
Lastly, I was always fixated at having a ‘Normal Delivery’, she asked me to be mentally prepared for both & I did, considering my history & the fact that I was delivering a baby at a ‘not so favourable’ age of 32yrs. But when the time came, she ensured that she does everything in her hand to facilitate a Normal delivery for me & my baby! In the OT too, it was her calm & clear instructions that guided me through the pain & helped me get done with the delivery in under 10mins! Just trust her to do the right thing & you will be through!! That’s what I did!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: My pregnancy journey starting under doctor sonal katwala guidance.   *** ** *** **** ************* *

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
** ***** ** *** **** ****** She gives proper advice and guidance with proper line of treatment.
She is experienced i have being going to her since past 3 years .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Infertility And Pcod,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I am Dr Sonal Katwala's patient since 2 years. I recently delivered a Baby boy (May 2023) under her supervision. I used to visit her for my PCOS condition and she handled my case really well. She never put me on any birth control pills and gave me proper advice as well as some multi vitamins supplements which led to regular periods. After my PCOS treatment we decided to plan a baby under her guidance. She suggested follicular study of ovulation as i had irregular period cycle of sometimes 45days to 60days. In 3rd follicular cycle i conceived. Right from pre pregnancy guidance to through the pregnancy and post that, the experience has been very satisfactory and wonderful. She has been extremely honest, always gave us clear instructions and advice. She was always available a phone call away during any urgent situation. The every 15 days follow ups helped to judge any complications in the pregnancy. Sterling hospital that she suggested was also extremely good in terms of ventilation, cleanliness and service.  I aimed for a normal delivery, however, it looked difficult as even after 24hrs of labour journey i wasn't dilated as needed. I had an emergency C-section but it went extremely smooth. The rapport she creates with her patient is very comforting and feels like home.  The best thing about her is she is straightforward and will give you all the pros and cons of the situation.  I would definitely recommend her and her team. Thank you Dr Sonal for such a wonderful experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We were under Dr. Sonal's care during pregnancy and birth. She was very calm, patiently answered our queries, pro-active, pushed for home remedies first to minimise medication and helped with a detailed and to the point  explanations. We are very happy to be under her guidance and would definitely recommend visiting her :) Thank you, doctor, for your guidance and support throughout our journey.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** ******* A BIG THANK YOU!!!!!
I will never forget  your smile in the hospital room when I was admitted for the operation. Your bright aura brought so much joy and inner healing.
I always thought that surgeons were haughty, arrogant and self-obsessed. Thanks for proving that they are the exact opposites.
Your care, concern and encouragement has done what the medicines alone would not have achieved. You helped replace the fear of illness with the trust of recovery. Your charming smile, Meticulous update on the planned line of action and your confidence were very reassuring.
It is all thanks to you and your positivity that I managed to be on my feet so soon after the surgery.
The belief you showed in me….. helped me take up the surgery with positivity and confidence.
You have ensured me the best possible service and it is your magic that has healed me! You have my deepest respect Doc…..Thank you Doc.  You are a blessing on earth.
 Continue to be a blessing to others through your profession.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Termination of Pregnancy,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Pregnancy,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
I have been consulting Dr.Sonal Katwal since a year now (Feb 2019-March 2020)
My Husband got her reference from Practo, and we decided to consult her for our second pregnancy.
I wanted to consult a Gynac who would really listen to my questions and address them (missed this comfort in my first pregnancy )
There were many ups and down in my pregnancy, 2 months after conceiving we faced abortion. 
Dr.Sonal talked us through this down time, gave her expert advise and explained us in detail
what should  be done and why. 
Post this we conceived again after 2 months and faced some rough time in the first trimester. 
She made sure unless the problem was addressed i was under her close observation. 
Post this the rest of the pregnancy went very well under her guidance. I had a C-section and I must share I wasn’t worried about anything as I was sure of being in her safe hands 
We are blessed with a beautiful Baby girl under her consultation 

She is excellent in her work, very patient and has a  positive approach. She always went an extra mile when such a situation arised
We highly recommend her without a split second thought. She made my pregnancy journey very comfortable and a memorable one.
We really thank her for this experience

review: ***** ***** ** ** ********* ******* Since past 1 ½ years I was suffering from abdominal pain and even after acquiring treatment from so many different doctors it was of no use but after meeting her with the help of her expertise in her field she diagnosed my problem and also explained to me in detail about it and also gave me possible solutions to my problem and told me about the urgency of my problem. She relaxed my tension related with my surgery.  After the surgery she took excellent care of my other health problems in the hospital. Thank........ You doctor for all the things you did for me. Now I am fine all because of her.😊

review: I had informed one family friend that Dr. Sonal mam is best for pregnancy check up, so I had visited her after got pregnant. Dr. Sonal katwala mam is an amazing doctor and a wonderful person.  My experience was like, I had got a friend to whom we can share and ask any queries, she can easily and friendly explains and suggest whatever the best for us/patients. I am very thankful to her for her support during some really tough times, as well as her encouragement to help us to get to the best times in our life. I'm beyond thankful for my daughter. Words can't say how much I appreciate her but thank you so much for everything! And best wishes for the future!!

review: The most wonderful the most amicable the most knowledge doctor I have ever met.I have been visiting her for my pregnancy since the day I conceived. She helped me in gaining positive results with positive mindset. Whenever I face any challenging situations she was just a phone call away. She listens to me patiently and gives the right advice,  she doesn't take her patient like any case but take them very personally, even in the lockdown she was one call away and available to respond my queries. she never made her patient to wait for long, she made my pregnancy journey so easy, I had Never thought that I would deliver normal but she made it possible..for me she is not less than a goddess. I will miss mam and my routine visit.I would strongly recommend her to every women.

review: **** ****** *** best person I m obase my weight was 125 kg luckily I was expecting in March 2020 yes in lockdown I m person with with high sugar I found her number from  Google she responded me very well n after 3 month I met her in sterling hospital she is so good experience kind n great for me she is angle which is gifted of God throughout my pregnancy n c section with this weight it was very hard journey for me but she is really angel who make me very comfortable throughout my pregnancy thank-you mam thank-you very much

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: My entire pregnancy experience right till my delivery went extremely smooth, all thanks to Dr.Sonal. Since bearing a child and giving birth are life time experiences, my partner and I were extremely careful in choosing our doctor. We definitely made the right choice! She has been extremely honest, always gave us clear instructions and advice. She was always available a phone call away during any urgent situation. Sterling hospital that she suggested was also extremely good in terms of ventilation, cleanliness and service. The c-section delivery was done very quickly and I don’t remember being in pain at all. I would highly recommend Dr. Sonal as someone who you can truly trust! Thank you once again doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,Pregnant Women Counseling,Pregnancy,
review:
We were recommended to Dr. Sonal by my sister, who had her great experience, and it was the same with us. From day one, it has been precise and correct diagnosis carried out by the doctor. We never had to think about what is going to be our next step. Every 15 days, we had a fixed appointment with the doctor, where she would check all the necessary vitals and things to be taken care of till the next appointment. 
As per Dr. Sonal's recommendation, we booked the Sterling Hospital for the delivery. With no surprises, the same was the right choice that we made. All the facilities and support provided by hospital staff and doctors early at 4:00 AM for our little angel birth was phenomenal. 
With the correct and timely guidance by Dr. Sonal at every step, we are proud parents of a cute little angel.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We were new in Mumbai and got to know about her through Practo. My wife was just 3 weeks pregnant back then. The more we visited her the more comfortable we became about the pregnancy. She explained things to the point. She answered all our queries patiently and the best part of Dr Sonal is that she gives time to her patients. We had a preterm baby in March , a day before the lockdown and trust me Dr. Sonal did everything in her power to make us feel relaxed during the lockdown period. Starting from hospital to NICU and the days in hospital, everything went smoothly because of her care. With no family around she was our family who took care of us during that critical period. I would highly recommend her without any second thought.

At first we thought that the doctor had diagnosed the issue and would recommend solutions once the condition is stable *** ********** *** ****** *** ******** ** ****** **** *********** ****** ** ****** ***** **** *** *** ** **** **** ******* ** **** ************.

On asking few questions related to miscarriage, she said “ it’s normal! You never know what can go wrong. I’ll tell what tests to be done in next appointment” *** ****** *** ******** ** ** ** *** **********.

Would never recommend this doctor special for the couples who are planning a baby for the first time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Both in my 1st and 2nd pregnancy baby was delivered by the same doctor. In both pregnancies Baby was delivered via C-sec. The doctor is very friendly with the patient  and I would recommend the doctor to anyone.  Inspite of having a C sec there is no pain or any problems, not even wen I was recovering i faces any issues. *** ** *** **** *** ****** ** *** ****** ********* Only if there are any complications involved then only she will ask the patient for  C sec.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Katwala was a natural choice going by the reviews and a recommendation by a family member. We started our journey towards parenthood under her guidance, hoping for a normal delivery like most other parents-to-be. However, some things changed at the last moment and we opted for a c-section. Dr. Katwala had been very thorough with her work and made sure that the surgery went smooth. I found it very easy compared to what people had said about c-section and the stigma around it. I would definitely recommend her to anyone planning to become parents.
Doctor has very much experience but not that friendly or you may be feel awkward to explain your symptoms.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: We got reference of Dr. Sonal Katwala from practo & in first visit we decided to go with Dr.Sonal for my pregnancy consultation. I had PCOD issues for which she guided me through very well and within 1 month of consulting her i conceived & delivered a healthy baby boy through a normal delivery. she has been great support to me. I'm so thankful to her. Such an amazing Doctor.  i would strongly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My name is Swati Subhash. I have been under Dr.Sonal Katwala's observation for more than 7 years now for my gynaec uterus fibroids problem.  She has been very caring and observing my situation. When in May '21 I had severe pain during periods, she told me to do necessary tests based on which guided me for hysterectomy.  Accordingly, I was operated in April  and I am recovering now.  I strongly recommend Dr. Sonal for various gynaec problem s. Thank you Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We got reference of Dr. Sonal through Practo and decided to go ahead with her consultantion for my 1st pregnancy.My pregnancy journey has been a smooth ride and th entire credit goes to Dr. Sonal. She has been extremely kind, patient, caring and understanding during all our visits and patiently answered all our queries and doubts. At no point in time, Dr. Sonal advised irrelevant tests / medicines and always gave her unbiased opinion. Even during the pandamic, she was in constant touch and used to take regular follow ups since frequent visits /meeting in person consultation was not advisable during lockdown. In today's time, very rarely doctor would prefer normal delivery while Dr Sonal encouraged and motivated us  for only and only normal delivery since the beginning.  We were fortunate enough that we consulted Dr Sonal and under her guidance and observation, we delivered a healthy baby boy!! I would strongly recommend new parents to be to consult Dr Sonal.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was really a good experience with Dr Sonal Katwala from start to end.
